text: Alsino and the Condor () is 1982 Nicaraguan Cuban Mexican Costa Rican drama movie directed by Miguel Littín and starring Dean Stockwell, Alan Esquivel, Carmen Bunster, Alejandro Parodi, Reynaldo Miravalles. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1983. ==Other websites== * Category:1982 drama movies Category:Nicaraguan movies Category:Cuban movies Category:Mexican drama movies Category:Costa Rican movies Category:Movies directed by Miguel Littín
title: Alsino and the Condor
